input: Which one of the following is the correct sequence of persons who occupied the office of the President of India right from beginning?

options.A: C. Rajagopalachari, Rajendra Prasad, Zakir Hussian, V. V. giri
options.B: Rajendra Prasad, S. Radhakrishna, V. V. giri, Zakir Hussian
options.C: C. Rajagopalachari, Rajendra Prasad, S. Radhakrishna, Fakhruddin Ali Ahmad
options.D: Rajendra Prasad, S. Radhakrishna, Zakir Hussian, V. V. Giri
